title: Amanda Seales
description:
Another great episode this week as Kevin Hart is joined by comedian Amanda Seales. The two discuss how she started her career as a child actor, her unapologetic comedy style, the importance of her HBO special 'I Be Knowin', and her journey as a black female comic in this industry.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Amanda Seales)
